hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A pint of beer each. Because... well, why not?

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How useful or exciting is your hack? Is it fun? Roughly how much your hack would be used, i.e the demand.
How creative is your hack? Is the idea innovative in some way? Is the way you've built it, or some aspect of it innovative or new?

How hard was your hack to build? Did you meet some great technical challenge? This is balanced with completeness, i.e, a hard hack with a few features or a simple hack with many features will score the same.
How feasible is it to deploy your hack? Could it be released or commercialized? E.g, deploying a website versus giving everyone in the world an exploding cat to make it work.

hackathon-description-header: Come work for 48 hours on YOUR ideas.
